Intervention: Tomosynthesis The breast scan is made and the breast scan is made.
Eligibility: Incorporation criteria:
- 35 years or more
Although male patients are not explicitly excluded, it is expected that all patients in this study will be women.
Diagnostic results of a suspected or highly suggestive anterior mammogram of breast malignancy -BIRADS (Breast Imaging Reporting and Data System) categories 4 and 5
• Scheduled for ultrasound or stereotaxis biopsy of the nucleus
• Ability to stay on a table top for up to 10 minutes, longer than the typical duration of the breast CT.
Capacity to understand associated risks, procedures and benefits
- Exclusion criteria:
Recent breast biopsy
• History of implantation of breast augmentation
● Urine pregnancy test (UPT) or breast-feeding in progress
History of moderate or severe adverse reactions to iodized contrast injection
Recent serum creatinine 1.5 mg/dL
History of diabetes Mellitus
During treatment with Glucophagus or Glucovance (Metformin)
• History of chronic asthma
• History of iodine allergy
• Multiple food and/or drug allergies
Renal disorders
History of lung disease, breath phobia or other condition that may prevent the person from taking 16 seconds of breath
Results: - Frequency range corresponding to the sound power spectrum (NPS) where beta = NPS(f) = af^-B.
The exposure values, beta, range from 1.5 to 3.5 lower beta values correspond to better image quality (less noise, increased detection of cancer).
Title of the arm/group: Breast cancer patients
Description of the arm/group: Tomosynthesis The breast scan is done and the breast scan is done.
Unit of measurement: slope of power law(B) 1.75 (0.424)
